description: 2020 marked the year, when all humanity was connected and forced to change. Everyone has a story to tell as a result of it and here is mine… For the first time in my life, i experienced what its like to have your plans not work out, as if that has never happened before. Maybe it was different this time or maybe it was the same as an infant learning to walk, but constantly being greeted by the gravitational pull of failure.
